alert.note: Alert for Lenawee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:11PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lenawee County through 230 PM EDT... At 111 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Adrian, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tecumseh around 140 PM EDT. Britton around 145 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Jasper, Macon, Springville, Ridgeway, Palmyra, Fairfield, Tipton, Holloway and Sand Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
